game_description: The realistic controls allow you to feel like you're on the basketball court. The more points you get and make, the better your ranking. Every day, you get to enjoy playing basketball whenever you want! Basketball is one of the world's most popular sports, and now, it's even more fun with VR Basketball! Don't miss out on this game! Compete against the clock to get as many points as you can and try to beat the high score! and the high distance VR Basketball utilizes unique technology in allowing for a never-before-experienced simulation of basketball featuring: Realistic controls that involve dribbling, shooting, brings you the feel of a true basketball game play in various game modes : Free mode or Contre Time
review_1: Very bad physics and the basketballs are evan an oval shape.I can get a free basketball game with better physics and graphics
review_2: Basketball physics are decent. Could use more depth otherwise great way to kill time playing. Hope it gets more update in the future
review_3: I would just recommend to be able to pick basketballs up with the grip
review_4: Nice little game for short burst fun. Nothing groundbreaking and modes are limited but does exactly what it sets out to do.
